name: Biology
feeDetails:
The course fees for 2022 are as follows:




UK students £9,250 
EU students £9,250 
International students £16,045
aboutCourse:
The biology School Direct PGCE will enable you to develop the professional skills and knowledge to deliver all aspects of science up to GCSE, as well biology to students studying at A-level.

You will:
•	Develop creative approaches to teaching science at all levels
•	Develop resources for future teaching
•	Develop a critical understanding of current debates relating to science and education
•	Develop your subject knowledge

You will need:
-A degree in biology or a biology related subject, or a joint degree with biology as the main component (2:2 minimum).
-A sound knowledge of basic physics and chemistry.
-GCSE English language (grade A*-C)
-GCSE maths (grade A*-C)
-Clear and accurate written and spoken English

If you have non-UK qualifications, you should present your UK-NARIC statement(s) of comparability at interview.
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
You will:
•	Develop creative approaches to teaching at all levels
•	Develop resources for future teaching
•	Develop a critical understanding of current debates relating to science and education
•	Develop your subject knowledge
personalQualities: You will need to demonstrate sufficient understanding of and insight into the role of the teacher, the classroom environment and the processes involved in learning and teaching. In order to show such understanding and insight it may be beneficial to undertake a visit to a school.
